duties_responsibilities.duty: Loading/unloading packages onto/off of appropriate trailer by scanning, lifting, carrying, pushing, and pulling packages up to 100 lbs. in weight in a safe and efficient manner.
Required to read labels, verify numbers, and carry out work instructions while achieving required productivity metrics.
General housekeeping tasks including sweeping, unpacking, and "detrashing" of vehicles and/or shipments.
Attend safety meetings as required and notify management immediately of any unsafe working conditions.
May assist in the orientation of new hire package handlers.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, and 0-2 years of related experience.
